description: Contains demographic information about patients (people, users, clients).

columns.name: Full name of the patient
columns.age: Age of the patient in years
columns.chronic_condition: Ongoing medical conditions (e.g., Diabetes, Arthritis, Asthma, Heart Disease)
columns.state: US State of residence (location, region, geography, country)

description: Records of patient medical visits. JOIN with 'patients' table via patient_id to get patient details.

columns.patient_id: Foreign key linking to patients table
columns.diagnosis: Primary diagnosis code, condition, illness, disease, ailment, flu (Influenza)

description: Financial records. Linked to 'visits' via visit_id. NO direct patient_id. To get patient info, you MUST JOIN billing -> visits -> patients.

columns.visit_id: Foreign key linking to visits table
columns.amount: Total amount billed in USD. 'Outstanding balance' means amount where status is 'Pending' or 'Overdue'.
columns.status: Payment status (Paid, Pending, Overdue). 'Unpaid' means Pending or Overdue.
